column2: we waited over 45 mins for our reservation tonight and I was very frustrated. By the end of the night
column3: not only the food was amazing (as usual) and our server max was one of the best I've had. He was so kind and recommended the BEST food. I would come back for him alone- also the manager was very apologetic for the wait and was so kind. Would highly recommend for the food and customer service - worth the wait :)
